channel.title: Expansion on the forums
channel.description:
I believe we need new boards.
A graphics section maybe?

item.title: Expansion on the forums
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:70, topic:386944”][quote author=Rash link=topic=482712.msg3538506#msg3538506 date=1300694355]

Art/graphics design section.

I looked at MITB, and its a group of older members, who spurn anyone they dont know.

Actually if you make quality posts then they will probably accept you

I’ve started trying.
I have to think before I post tho, and that annoys me
[/quote]
ikr?? I can hardly find any sections over there which I might want to post in.[/quote]

This is true

Read full topic

item.title: Expansion on the forums
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:65, topic:386944”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=482712.msg3537151#msg3537151 date=1300630753]
Sorry everyone, but I think that a graphics section wouldn’t serve much purpose. Not that many people are interested in graphics, etc, and there’s bound to be more advertising.
[/quote]
More people are into graphics compared to Minecraft[/quote]That’s not accurate

Read full topic

item.title: Expansion on the forums
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Jc22493:

Sorry everyone, but I think that a graphics section wouldn’t serve much purpose. Not that many people are interested in graphics, etc, and there’s bound to be more advertising.

More people are into graphics compared to Minecraft, and it got a new section. Rumor has it it’s even getting it’s own website.

Read full topic

item.title: Expansion on the forums
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:16, topic:386944”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=482712.msg3535306#msg3535306 date=1300515171]
Why do people from MITB hate us and vice versa.

We are all one, we need to stick together.
[/quote]
Wrong.
We are older, mature, and just better in general. It’s an elitist mind. We have earned the ability to act this way as we’ve been here so long. You are all new to the scene.[/quote] You suck. So you could go fuck yourself and your old immature niggers at the other side of the river.

Read full topic

[/quote]

[quote author=jme link=topic=482712.msg3535574#msg3535574 date=1300547252]
Back on the subject of a graphics section here. I don’t see the harm really.[/quote]

Is jme high enough?

[quote author=Rash link=topic=482712.msg3536736#msg3536736 date=1300597238]
Want me to, or do you want the honors?
[/quote]Up to you.[/quote]

Im not sure as to the pros and cons, so you should (Y)

item.title: Expansion on the forums
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I, myself, would just post cool tricks, things I made, funny images, web site images, banners (not rsps), logos, etc. I would possibly make a banner for people, but not advertise.

[me=I Vain I]pledges to report all topics in the graphic section that contain advertising links, pictures, or posts[/me]
(if we get one)[/quote]

Put that red text in your signature.
